creator: Trukkr Pakistan
descriptionHtml:
Introducing Trukkr.pk

An online platform that matches carriers with shippers: Cost efficiencies, flexibility, savings and best of all no more back-load losses.

We make the process of booking commercial cargo fast by linking a shipper directly with a driver over a secure, intuitive and powerful platform. We ensure that shippers have complete transparency in price discovery, visibility, flexibility, and choice while at the same time give drivers easy access to more jobs whenever they want them.

Trukkr offers a digitized solution to your water problems. Along with moving your goods, Trukkr provides premium water tanker service. Choose from the multiple quantities available. Tap and let Trukkr handle your water problems.

Manage all your shipments on one smart and convenient platform. Locate available trucks across Pakistan without any need to make multiple phone calls - monitor your shipments in real time every step of the way. Trukkr ensures that you are connected with the most suitable fleet operator at any given point of time depending on your destination, cargo and urgency. Ship your goods at the lowest price in the shortest possible time frame.


Step by step guide to request a Trukkr service:

1) Download the Trukkr app
2) Choose the service you desire from the available options
3) Select and confirm your drop-off location
4) Book your Trukkr service and instantly receive confirmation, complete with your drivers details and location.
5) Track your booked service in real time.
descriptionShort: Access hassle-free trucking through our friendly website and mobile apps.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We update the Trukkr user app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

- Updates to improve UI across the app
- Various bug fixes & improvements
- New categories added
- Book a vehicle for duration feature added

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Trukkr engine running.
